name: nokan's alley
description:
this game was created for #3310jam and was supposed to mash up hogan's alley with bank panic, but I ran out of time.

Controls:

S/D/F or numpad 5/6/7 : shoot left / center / right

Shoot the armed thugs. The game is over if you shoot the nurse or nun or miss 5 times.

post jam todos:

  • spice up the gameplay with delayed or spinning targets
  • possibly add one or two additional targets and scrolling
  • add a propper game over screen
